name: Daniel Wolfe
text: It never gets better.   I just got one of the awesome lunch combo pizzas...it had so much red sauce on it, it was literally dripping out from under the cheese.  I understand that true Italian pizza will emphasize the sauce frequently.  But ‚Ä¶More

text: Great atmosphere.  Must keep pizza ready to serve.  Must keep salad items refilled also.  Grew a little impatient waiting for more items to be replaced

name: Sara Ferrera
text: Wow they changed management and staff! This location which is close to my home has done a complete 360 turn around, staff are not rude the food is fresh I went after 8pm and wasnt lied to about being out of wings I'm very shocked now! Extra ‚Ä¶More

name: Jasmin Bryan
text: The one by Howells ferry off of Moffett never has the pizza ready, people are rude and they always are out of certain specialty  pizzas. Especially deep dish. If you want a good little chasers go to the one by Walmart.  They are really good.

name: Keisha Allen
text: Delicious pizza, yummy wings, and the most amazing cheesy bread. My orders are always hot and fresh. There's so many toppings to chose from. I appreciate the quality of their business. Whether its lunch on the go. Or a night I can skip cooking dinner accompanied with a mountain of dishes. I'm most certainly there.

name: David Everett
text: No matter what you order... you have to wait 15 to 20 mins.  Insist on cash Never have change ( or so they claim) debit machine not working.... also claim they can't give a receipt....  sounds fishy to me and I'm not talking about anchovies

name: Loren Deagro
text: It took 15 minutes to get a "Hot n Ready" pizza at 4:30pm after being told 6 minutes. I could have been understanding of the time issue, but my pizza was extremely overcooked, the cheese was burnt and only covered 3/4 of the pizza.

name: Gacha Gia
text: Bc it's supposed to be hot n READY.. It's NEVER READY.. They open at 10:30.. I get her at 10:49.. I'm still waiting on a cheese pizza to take to my daughter's schoolüò°

name: Jennifer Fraunfelder
text: The pizza was sub-par. I was initially over charged for my order which in turn had to be refunded and charged again. The pizza was just blah, nothing exciting or extraordinary. I think we are done with pizza, or atleast Little Caesars.
